channel.title: Can this be done? and how do you do it?
channel.description:
I want to turn my summoning list into a shop list. so people dont have to talk or trade npcs to gain items.
I would love to know, because im making my PK server good, and its good if theirs no npcs to attack by accident or npcs their to be in the way. no attacking npcs, No crashes?

item.title: Can this be done? and how do you do it?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

it is in mine too but theres a method for opening up a shop

EDIT: if (WanneShop > 0) { if (GoodDistance(skillX, skillY, absX, absY, 1) == true) { openUpShop(WanneShop); WanneShop = 0; } }

wanneshop uses the openupshop method

Read full topic

item.title: Can this be done? and how do you do it?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

find all the summoning cases and delete everything thats in the case then put

openUpShop(#);

change the shop number to the shop you want to open up

then find your sendquest for each name of the monster you want to summon and change it to the shop name

Read full topic
